sourcesContent:
import React, { useState } from 'react'; import { useQuery } from 'react-query'; import { BarChart3, TrendingUp, Users, MapPin, Star, Eye, Heart, DollarSign, Calendar, Download } from 'lucide-react'; import axios from 'axios'; import { LineChart, Line, AreaChart, Area, BarChart, Bar, PieChart, Pie, Cell, XAxis, YAxis, CartesianGrid, Tooltip, Legend, ResponsiveContainer } from 'recharts'; const Analytics = () => { const [selectedPeriod, setSelectedPeriod] = useState('30d'); const { data: dashboardData, isLoading } = useQuery( ['analytics-dashboard', selectedPeriod], () => axios.get(`/api/analytics/dashboard?period=${selectedPeriod}`).then(res => res.data), { staleTime: 5 * 60 * 1000, } ); const { data: engagementData } = useQuery( ['analytics-engagement', selectedPeriod], () => axios.get(`/api/analytics/engagement?period=${selectedPeriod}`).then(res => res.data), { staleTime: 5 * 60 * 1000, } ); const { data: sentimentData } = useQuery( 'analytics-sentiment', () => axios.get('/api/analytics/sentiment').then(res => res.data), { staleTime: 5 * 60 * 1000, } ); const periodOptions = [ { value: '7d', label: 'Last 7 days' }, { value: '30d', label: 'Last 30 days' }, { value: '90d', label: 'Last 90 days' }, { value: '1y', label: 'Last year' } ]; const COLORS = ['#0088FE', '#00C49F', '#FFBB28', '#FF8042', '#8884D8']; if (isLoading) { return (
); } return (
{/* Header */}

Analytics Dashboard

Monitor tourism trends and platform performance

{/* Overview Stats */}

Total Users

{dashboardData?.overview?.totalUsers || 0}

+{dashboardData?.overview?.newUsers || 0} this period

Destinations

{dashboardData?.overview?.totalDestinations || 0}

Active listings

Itineraries

{dashboardData?.overview?.totalItineraries || 0}

{dashboardData?.overview?.aiGeneratedItineraries || 0} AI-generated

Marketplace

{(dashboardData?.overview?.totalProducts || 0) + (dashboardData?.overview?.totalServices || 0)}

Products & Services

{/* User Growth Chart */}

User Growth

{/* Destination Categories */}

Destination Categories

`${name} ${(percent * 100).toFixed(0)}%`} outerRadius={80} fill="#8884d8" dataKey="count" > {(dashboardData?.destinationCategories || []).map((entry, index) => ( ))}
{/* User Roles */}

User Roles

{dashboardData?.usersByRole?.map((role, index) => (
{role._id}
{role.count}
))}
{/* Engagement Stats */}

Engagement

Active Users {engagementData?.activeUsers || 0}
AI vs Manual Itineraries
{engagementData?.itineraryStats?.map((stat, index) => (
{stat._id ? 'AI' : 'Manual'}: {stat.count}
))}
{/* Sentiment Analysis */}

Sentiment Analysis

Positive {sentimentData?.sentimentStats?.positive || 0}
Neutral {sentimentData?.sentimentStats?.neutral || 0}
Negative {sentimentData?.sentimentStats?.negative || 0}
{/* Popular Destinations */}

Top Rated Destinations

{dashboardData?.topRatedDestinations?.map((destination, index) => (

{destination.name}

{destination.rating?.average?.toFixed(1) || '4.5'}

{destination.category}

))}
); }; export default Analytics;
